title: Walnut Brown Solid Stretchable Premium Cotton Blazer
story_description:
Story Are you a fashion-conscious gentleman searching for a versatile and sophisticated blazer?
Look no further than our Walnut Brown Solid Premium Cotton blazer. Crafted with meticulous attention
to detail and made from high-quality cotton fabric, this blazer is a perfect blend of elegance and
comfort. The walnut brown color exudes timeless charm, offering a rich and distinctive look that
sets you apart from the crowd. Whether you're attending a formal event, a business meeting, or a
special occasion, this blazer is a versatile choice that effortlessly combines classic style with
contemporary flair. Our premium cotton fabric ensures a luxurious feel against your skin, providing
maximum comfort throughout the day. The breathable nature of cotton makes it ideal for various
climates, keeping you cool and confident even during warmer seasons.

title: Jade Black Designer Premium Cotton Blazer
story_description:
Story Our most luxurious Giza Cotton, and this one is as good as it gets. Made with ultra-premium
certified West Indian Sea Island Cotton from Barbados, it has the perfect combination of durability,
super soft handful, vibrant Print, and silky luster. This Blazer offers our signature quality and
tailoring at an excellent value. Crafted of Giza cotton in italy, and sold as fully finished
separates to make it easier to find your perfect fit. Two-button silhouette, notched lapels with
pick-stitched detailing, Black buttons, finished sleeve cuffs, besom chest pocket, convertible
flap-welt waist pockets, Side vents. Fully lined interior features our signature piping and two
interior pockets. Regent Fit: Our best-seller. The perfect fit for just about everybody; fitted at
the chest, shoulders and waist.

Story Looking for a standout outfit that's both trendy and unique? Check out this Cotton Thread
Embroidered Bandhgala Jodhpuri blazer, made especially for premium weddings and high-class
occasions. When you shop at French Crown, you can be confident that all of our products are made
with the highest quality materials and craftsmanship. The Bandhgala Jodhpuri style of the blazer
adds an element of timeless elegance, while the unique embroidery details give it a contemporary
twist. It's the perfect outfit for anyone who wants to make a statement with their fashion sense.

title: Mercury Cream Thread Embroidered Bandhgala Blazer
story_description:
Story Introducing the ultimate fusion of traditional elegance and modern style - the Mercury Cream
Embroidered Bandhgala Jodhpuri blazer. Crafted with utmost precision and attention to detail, this
exquisite ensemble is the perfect choice for the fashion-conscious groom looking to make a bold
statement on their big day. The Mercury Cream color of the blazer exudes sophistication and charm,
while the embroidered pattern adds a touch of refinement and class. The Jodhpuri style further
elevates the blazer, offering a unique and trendy twist on traditional Indian attire. So go ahead,
embrace this trend, and step out in style!

title: Cocoa Bean Maroon With Sequins Embroidered Bandhgala Blazer
story_description:
Story If you ever find yourself in a fashion emergency, there's no need to panic! French Crown has
got you covered. Our collection of trendy pieces is designed to not only rescue you from a fashion
emergency but also ensure that you look effortlessly stylish no matter where you're headed. For
instance, take a closer look at one of our most stylish pieces. This cocoa bean blazer is a
head-turner, thanks to its perfect contrast between the base color and the sequin embroidery. The
striking metallic button closure adds a touch of glamour that elevates the overall look. So why
wait? Grab this today and discover the perfect fashion solution for yourself!

title: Big Stone Blue Premium Cotton Designer Tuxedo Blazer with Shawl
story_description:
Story Why choose less, when you can have the best? Look at this amazing designer tuxedo suit from
French Crown. It is designed with a unique tuxedo-style lapel, which makes it appropriate for formal
events and occasions such as weddings, black-tie events, and other formal parties. The shawl on the
backside adds an interesting visual element to this suit. It is tailored using pure cotton and
provides a sleek and modern fit, with a regular silhouette that flatters the wearer's body. Overall,
this solid Suit is a great option for men who want to make a fashion statement while still
maintaining a classic and timeless look.

title: Haiti Blue Single Breasted Blazer
story_description:
Return Policy Free returns within 60 days No Questions Asked We gladly accept returns as it is a
fantastic opportunity for us to show you our honesty and transparency. We will also get your
feedback to improve our products and services. We encourage you to return because your satisfaction
and comfort is our utmost priority. We don’t want our customers to get even slightly dissatisfied,
hence we advise you to go ahead and ask for refund/exchange. Help us to know your needs better so
that we can provide you with our best of products and services. Returning with French crown is as
easy as ordering. You can place return request online in “My Account” section or you can email us at
contact@frenchcrown.com or call / WhatsApp us at 9723325522 and help us know your concern. We will
schedule a time with you and instruct our shipping partner to pick up the original French Crown
garment. Also note that we do not provide reverse pick-up service for order value less than Rs1000.
In such cases we request you to please self-ship the product to us. You can self-ship the product
using any courier service of your choice. Please share the courier receipt at
contact@frenchcrown.com with your order number. Make sure the garment is unused and in good state.
You are required to return the main product ONLY. REFUND Once we receive return shipment, 100%
refund will be initiated within 24 hours. 1) If you have done online payment, your refund will be
credited into your bank account within 5 to 7 days. 2) If you have done cash on delivery, you need
to provide us your bank account no., bank name and IFSC code. We will refund your amount via NEFT or
IMPS within 2 to 5 days. 3) You can also ask for refund in term of ‘French Crown Cashback’, which
you can use in future to buy other French Crown products. 4) Refund is possible only after parcel is
dispatched, delivered and reverse pick is done. EXCHANGE Once return shipment is picked up from your
premises, we will dispatch your exchange shipment from our warehouse. Exchange your standard size
garment with custom size garment: If our standard sizes don’t fit you and you want custom fit
garment in exchange, then put your best fit garment with your French Crown garment in your return
shipment and our courier boy will pick it up from your premises. We will construct your garment from
the scratch according to your measurement and deliver it to you within 10 to 15 days. We will save
your measurements for your future orders also. In one order Refund/Exchange is possible for one time
Only. FOR CUSTOM GARMENTS We want to provide every customer a wonderful experience. However, it is
not very sustainable for us to offer returns and exchanges for a custom garment as it is already
manufactured according to your specifications and can’t be sold to anyone else. We will gladly
replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you discover a manufacturing defect with a
product you bought from our store, please send us an email at contact@frenchcrown.com from the email
you placed the order with. We also provide a free alteration within 15 days, starting from the day
you received your order.

title: River Bed Blue with Tallow Brown Plaid Single Breasted Blazer
story_description:
Return Policy Free returns within 60 days No Questions Asked We gladly accept returns as it is a
fantastic opportunity for us to show you our honesty and transparency. We will also get your
feedback to improve our products and services. We encourage you to return because your satisfaction
and comfort is our utmost priority. We don’t want our customers to get even slightly dissatisfied,
hence we advise you to go ahead and ask for refund/exchange. Help us to know your needs better so
that we can provide you with our best of products and services. Returning with French crown is as
easy as ordering. You can place return request online in “My Account” section or you can email us at
contact@frenchcrown.com or call / WhatsApp us at 9723325522 and help us know your concern. We will
schedule a time with you and instruct our shipping partner to pick up the original French Crown
garment. Also note that we do not provide reverse pick-up service for order value less than Rs1000.
In such cases we request you to please self-ship the product to us. You can self-ship the product
using any courier service of your choice. Please share the courier receipt at
contact@frenchcrown.com with your order number. Make sure the garment is unused and in good state.
You are required to return the main product ONLY. REFUND Once we receive return shipment, 100%
refund will be initiated within 24 hours. 1) If you have done online payment, your refund will be
credited into your bank account within 5 to 7 days. 2) If you have done cash on delivery, you need
to provide us your bank account no., bank name and IFSC code. We will refund your amount via NEFT or
IMPS within 2 to 5 days. 3) You can also ask for refund in term of ‘French Crown Cashback’, which
you can use in future to buy other French Crown products. 4) Refund is possible only after parcel is
dispatched, delivered and reverse pick is done. EXCHANGE Once return shipment is picked up from your
premises, we will dispatch your exchange shipment from our warehouse. Exchange your standard size
garment with custom size garment: If our standard sizes don’t fit you and you want custom fit
garment in exchange, then put your best fit garment with your French Crown garment in your return
shipment and our courier boy will pick it up from your premises. We will construct your garment from
the scratch according to your measurement and deliver it to you within 10 to 15 days. We will save
your measurements for your future orders also. In one order Refund/Exchange is possible for one time
Only. FOR CUSTOM GARMENTS We want to provide every customer a wonderful experience. However, it is
not very sustainable for us to offer returns and exchanges for a custom garment as it is already
manufactured according to your specifications and can’t be sold to anyone else. We will gladly
replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you discover a manufacturing defect with a
product you bought from our store, please send us an email at contact@frenchcrown.com from the email
you placed the order with. We also provide a free alteration within 15 days, starting from the day
you received your order.

fashion catalogs frequently, these blazers are out for grabs while stocks last.

title: Outer Space Green Double-Breasted Pure Wool Blazer
story_description:
Return Policy Free returns within 60 days No Questions Asked We gladly accept returns as it is a
fantastic opportunity for us to show you our honesty and transparency. We will also get your
feedback to improve our products and services. We encourage you to return because your satisfaction
and comfort is our utmost priority. We don’t want our customers to get even slightly dissatisfied,
hence we advise you to go ahead and ask for refund/exchange. Help us to know your needs better so
that we can provide you with our best of products and services. Returning with French crown is as
easy as ordering. You can place return request online in “My Account” section or you can email us at
contact@frenchcrown.com or call / WhatsApp us at 9723325522 and help us know your concern. We will
schedule a time with you and instruct our shipping partner to pick up the original French Crown
garment. Also note that we do not provide reverse pick-up service for order value less than Rs1000.
In such cases we request you to please self-ship the product to us. You can self-ship the product
using any courier service of your choice. Please share the courier receipt at
contact@frenchcrown.com with your order number. Make sure the garment is unused and in good state.
You are required to return the main product ONLY. REFUND Once we receive return shipment, 100%
refund will be initiated within 24 hours. 1) If you have done online payment, your refund will be
credited into your bank account within 5 to 7 days. 2) If you have done cash on delivery, you need
to provide us your bank account no., bank name and IFSC code. We will refund your amount via NEFT or
IMPS within 2 to 5 days. 3) You can also ask for refund in term of ‘French Crown Cashback’, which
you can use in future to buy other French Crown products. 4) Refund is possible only after parcel is
dispatched, delivered and reverse pick is done. EXCHANGE Once return shipment is picked up from your
premises, we will dispatch your exchange shipment from our warehouse. Exchange your standard size
garment with custom size garment: If our standard sizes don’t fit you and you want custom fit
garment in exchange, then put your best fit garment with your French Crown garment in your return
shipment and our courier boy will pick it up from your premises. We will construct your garment from
the scratch according to your measurement and deliver it to you within 10 to 15 days. We will save
your measurements for your future orders also. In one order Refund/Exchange is possible for one time
Only. FOR CUSTOM GARMENTS We want to provide every customer a wonderful experience. However, it is
not very sustainable for us to offer returns and exchanges for a custom garment as it is already
manufactured according to your specifications and can’t be sold to anyone else. We will gladly
replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you discover a manufacturing defect with a
product you bought from our store, please send us an email at contact@frenchcrown.com from the email
you placed the order with. We also provide a free alteration within 15 days, starting from the day
you received your order.

title: Mocha Brown Striped Single Breasted Blazer
story_description:
Return Policy Free returns within 60 days No Questions Asked We gladly accept returns as it is a
fantastic opportunity for us to show you our honesty and transparency. We will also get your
feedback to improve our products and services. We encourage you to return because your satisfaction
and comfort is our utmost priority. We don’t want our customers to get even slightly dissatisfied,
hence we advise you to go ahead and ask for refund/exchange. Help us to know your needs better so
that we can provide you with our best of products and services. Returning with French crown is as
easy as ordering. You can place return request online in “My Account” section or you can email us at
contact@frenchcrown.com or call / WhatsApp us at 9723325522 and help us know your concern. We will
schedule a time with you and instruct our shipping partner to pick up the original French Crown
garment. Also note that we do not provide reverse pick-up service for order value less than Rs1000.
In such cases we request you to please self-ship the product to us. You can self-ship the product
using any courier service of your choice. Please share the courier receipt at
contact@frenchcrown.com with your order number. Make sure the garment is unused and in good state.
You are required to return the main product ONLY. REFUND Once we receive return shipment, 100%
refund will be initiated within 24 hours. 1) If you have done online payment, your refund will be
credited into your bank account within 5 to 7 days. 2) If you have done cash on delivery, you need
to provide us your bank account no., bank name and IFSC code. We will refund your amount via NEFT or
IMPS within 2 to 5 days. 3) You can also ask for refund in term of ‘French Crown Cashback’, which
you can use in future to buy other French Crown products. 4) Refund is possible only after parcel is
dispatched, delivered and reverse pick is done. EXCHANGE Once return shipment is picked up from your
premises, we will dispatch your exchange shipment from our warehouse. Exchange your standard size
garment with custom size garment: If our standard sizes don’t fit you and you want custom fit
garment in exchange, then put your best fit garment with your French Crown garment in your return
shipment and our courier boy will pick it up from your premises. We will construct your garment from
the scratch according to your measurement and deliver it to you within 10 to 15 days. We will save
your measurements for your future orders also. In one order Refund/Exchange is possible for one time
Only. FOR CUSTOM GARMENTS We want to provide every customer a wonderful experience. However, it is
not very sustainable for us to offer returns and exchanges for a custom garment as it is already
manufactured according to your specifications and can’t be sold to anyone else. We will gladly
replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you discover a manufacturing defect with a
product you bought from our store, please send us an email at contact@frenchcrown.com from the email
you placed the order with. We also provide a free alteration within 15 days, starting from the day
you received your order.

title: Thunder Blue Velvet Tuxedo Designer Blazer
story_description:
Story This deep blue tuxedo Blazer for men is a wardrobe essential. Tailored in plush, soft,
polyester velvet, this Blazer can be worn with matching trousers, or with a shirt and tie. A tuxedo
blazer is a versatile piece of clothing that can be dressed up or down, depending on the occasion.
Tuxedos are the epitome of elegance in the menswear department, if you want to add essence to your
dapper look, you can add accessories like cufflinks, a bow tie & a pocket square to the blazer. This
blazer comes with the perfect fit for everybody. We offer mainly seasonal collections & update our
fashion catalogs frequently, these blazers are out for grabs while stocks last.

the scratch according to your measurement and deliver it to you within 10 to 15 days. We will save
your measurements for your future orders also. In one order Refund/Exchange is possible for one time
Only. FOR CUSTOM GARMENTS We want to provide every customer a wonderful experience. However, it is
not very sustainable for us to offer returns and exchanges for a custom garment as it is already
manufactured according to your specifications and can’t be sold to anyone else. We will gladly
replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you discover a manufacturing defect with a
product you bought from our store, please send us an email at contact@frenchcrown.com from the email
you placed the order with. We also provide a free alteration within 15 days, starting from the day
you received your order.

title: Wenge Brown Velvet Tuxedo Designer Blazer
story_description:
Story This wenge tuxedo Blazer for men is a wardrobe essential. Tailored in plush, soft, polyester
velvet, this Blazer can be worn with matching trousers, or with a shirt and tie. A tuxedo blazer is
a versatile piece of clothing that can be dressed up or down, depending on the occasion. Tuxedos are
the epitome of elegance in the menswear department, if you want to add essence to your dapper look,
you can add accessories like cufflinks, a bow tie & a pocket square to the blazer. This blazer comes
with the perfect fit for everybody. We offer mainly seasonal collections & update our fashion
catalogs frequently, these blazers are out for grabs while stocks last.

and metallic button fastening. The bandhgala collar is a high-standing collar that adds a touch of

interest. The blazer is made from high-quality fabrics, ensuring durability and comfort. It is a
versatile outfit that can be worn for a variety of occasions, including weddings, receptions, and
other important celebrations.

with precision by using high quality fabric, it is smooth on the skin. Wear this double-breasted
trench coat with a matching turtle neck sweater or shirt and shoes to look stylish.

title: Copper Yellow Wool Rich Double Breasted Sports Blazer
story_description:
Story The power of a double-breasted solid Blazer is immeasurable. Featuring a solid yellow
pattern, patch pockets, peak lapels, and double-breasted closure, this Blazer is all you need to
give a sober touch to your wardrobe. Pair this with a matching turtleneck pullover and oxford shoes
for a fantastic look.

title: Martini with Dark Taupe Brown Camouflage Premium Cotton Designer Blazer
story_description:
Story This blazer is a bold and daring outfit that exudes confidence and style. Made from
high-quality premium cotton fabric, the blazer features a unique camouflage pattern that adds a
touch of edginess to the traditional design. The two flap pockets not only provide functionality but
also add a subtle touch of sophistication. This designer blazer is perfect for those who want to
make a statement and stand out from the crowd with their fashion sense. Whether worn at an important
event or a casual gathering, this blazer will turn heads and leave a lasting impression.

Blazer from French Crown. Cut in a regular fit silhouette from comfortable and premium fabric for
lasting breathability, this solid creation is a must-have in your closet. Wear this with a black
shirt, a matching tie, and oxford shoes to complete the ensemble.

title: Rhino Blue Single Breasted Blazer
story_description:
Story This refined blazer from French Crown comes with a sartorial flair along with a solid blue
pattern. This regular-fit blazer features single-breasted closure, notch lapels, and two flap
pockets at the front. Round off the elegant look with a matching light shirt and tie. You can wear
it with your favourite oxford shoes to look amazing.

This regular-fit blazer features single-breasted closure, notch lapels, and two flap pockets at the

title: Thunder Gray Cross Placket Bandhgala Blazer
story_description:

texture, two side flap pockets, and stylish bandhgala closure set it apart in glamorous style. Rule
the ceremonies by pairing it with black oxford shoes.
description:

texture, two side flap pockets, and stylish bandhgala closure set it apart in glamorous style. Rule

title: Iridium Gray Single Breasted Blazer
story_description:
Story A classic single breasted Blazer that will keep you looking good for a long time. Cut to a
regular fit, this Blazer is made up of premium fabric which will keep you confident and comfortable
all day long. Style it to a formal event or a wedding and grab all the attention you need.

title: Wine with Lichen Green and Flamingo Pink Embroidered with Sequins Work Bandhgala Blazer
story_description:
Story This premium blazer from French Crown is a stylish and elegant traditional piece best
blazered for high class weddings and premium occasions. The blazer features a wine with green and
pink colour combination, with intricate embroidery and sequins work detailing. It also features
mandarin collar and metallic button fastening. The bandhgala collar is a high-standing collar that
adds a touch of formality to the blazer, while the sequins work embellishments add a pop of color
and visual interest. The blazer is made from high-quality fabrics, ensuring durability and comfort.
It is a versatile outfit that can be worn for a variety of occasions, including weddings,
receptions, and other important celebrations.
description:
This premium blazer from French Crown is a stylish and elegant traditional piece best blazered for
high class weddings and premium occasions. The blazer features a wine with green and pink colour
combination, with intricate embroidery and sequins work detailing. It also features mandarin collar
and metallic button fastening. The bandhgala collar is a high-standing collar that adds a touch of
formality to the blazer, while the sequins work embellishments add a pop of color and visual
interest. The blazer is made from high-quality fabrics, ensuring durability and comfort. It is a
versatile outfit that can be worn for a variety of occasions, including weddings, receptions, and
other important celebrations.

title: Fuscous Gray Cross Placket Bandhgala Blazer
story_description:
Story This solid gray cross-buttoned Bandhgala Blazer is great to show off your style. This premium
Blazer is crafted using top-notch durable fabric which feels soft on the skin, it has a mandarin
collar, five stylish metallic button fastenings, a chest pocket, and front plackets. Whether you're
the groom or a guest, this Blazer is sure to turn heads and leave a lasting impression. Wear oxford
shoes and put on a pocket square for a more sophisticated look.
description:
This solid gray cross-buttoned Bandhgala Blazer is great to show off your style. This premium Blazer
is crafted using top-notch durable fabric which feels soft on the skin, it has a mandarin collar,
five stylish metallic button fastenings, a chest pocket, and front plackets. Whether you're the
groom or a guest, this Blazer is sure to turn heads and leave a lasting impression. Wear oxford

title: Otter Green Damask Textured Designer Blazer
story_description:
Story Make a bold statement with this unique one-of-a-kind designer Suit. The stylish texture of
the fabric adds depth and dimension to the vibrant green hue, making you stand out in any crowd. But
the style doesn't stop there – this suit features metallic buttons that are purely for show, giving
it an edgy and fashion-forward touch. And while the suit cannot be buttoned, Layer it over solid
shirts that only add to its rebellious charm. Pair with a crisp white shirt and loafers for a sleek,
sophisticated look that will turn heads. Don't be afraid to take risks with this one-of-a-kind suit
– it's time to let your fashion sense shine.

Make a bold statement with this unique one-of-a-kind designer Suit. The stylish texture of the
fabric adds depth and dimension to the vibrant green hue, making you stand out in any crowd. But the

an edgy and fashion-forward touch. And while the suit cannot be buttoned, Layer it over solid shirts
that only add to its rebellious charm. Pair with a crisp white shirt and loafers for a sleek,
sophisticated look that will turn heads. Don't be afraid to take risks with this one-of-a-kind suit
– it's time to let your fashion sense shine.

title: Heavy Metal Green Double Breasted Blazer
story_description:
Story A solid double-breasted Blazer is the epitome of timeless style and sophistication. Made from
high-quality materials, this Blazer’s interior is fully lined for a comfortable feel. Perfect for
formal events or a day at the office, this Blazer is versatile, elegant, and built to last. Whether
you're dressing up or dressing down, a solid double-breasted Blazer is an investment that will
elevate your wardrobe for years to come.

title: Baltic Sea Blue Windowpane Cross Placket Bandhgala Blazer
story_description:
Return Policy Free returns within 60 days No Questions Asked We gladly accept returns as it is a
fantastic opportunity for us to show you our honesty and transparency. We will also get your
feedback to improve our products and services. We encourage you to return because your satisfaction
and comfort is our utmost priority. We don’t want our customers to get even slightly dissatisfied,
hence we advise you to go ahead and ask for refund/exchange. Help us to know your needs better so
that we can provide you with our best of products and services. Returning with French crown is as
easy as ordering. You can place return request online in “My Account” section or you can email us at
contact@frenchcrown.com or call / WhatsApp us at 9723325522 and help us know your concern. We will
schedule a time with you and instruct our shipping partner to pick up the original French Crown
garment. Also note that we do not provide reverse pick-up service for order value less than Rs1000.
In such cases we request you to please self-ship the product to us. You can self-ship the product
using any courier service of your choice. Please share the courier receipt at
contact@frenchcrown.com with your order number. Make sure the garment is unused and in good state.
You are required to return the main product ONLY. REFUND Once we receive return shipment, 100%
refund will be initiated within 24 hours. 1) If you have done online payment, your refund will be
credited into your bank account within 5 to 7 days. 2) If you have done cash on delivery, you need
to provide us your bank account no., bank name and IFSC code. We will refund your amount via NEFT or
IMPS within 2 to 5 days. 3) You can also ask for refund in term of ‘French Crown Cashback’, which
you can use in future to buy other French Crown products. 4) Refund is possible only after parcel is
dispatched, delivered and reverse pick is done. EXCHANGE Once return shipment is picked up from your
premises, we will dispatch your exchange shipment from our warehouse. Exchange your standard size
garment with custom size garment: If our standard sizes don’t fit you and you want custom fit
garment in exchange, then put your best fit garment with your French Crown garment in your return
shipment and our courier boy will pick it up from your premises. We will construct your garment from
the scratch according to your measurement and deliver it to you within 10 to 15 days. We will save
your measurements for your future orders also. In one order Refund/Exchange is possible for one time
Only. FOR CUSTOM GARMENTS We want to provide every customer a wonderful experience. However, it is
not very sustainable for us to offer returns and exchanges for a custom garment as it is already
manufactured according to your specifications and can’t be sold to anyone else. We will gladly
replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you discover a manufacturing defect with a
product you bought from our store, please send us an email at contact@frenchcrown.com from the email
you placed the order with. We also provide a free alteration within 15 days, starting from the day
you received your order.

title: Jade Black with Light Taupe Brown Striped Single-Breasted Blazer
story_description:
Return Policy Free returns within 60 days No Questions Asked We gladly accept returns as it is a
fantastic opportunity for us to show you our honesty and transparency. We will also get your
feedback to improve our products and services. We encourage you to return because your satisfaction
and comfort is our utmost priority. We don’t want our customers to get even slightly dissatisfied,
hence we advise you to go ahead and ask for refund/exchange. Help us to know your needs better so
that we can provide you with our best of products and services. Returning with French crown is as
easy as ordering. You can place return request online in “My Account” section or you can email us at
contact@frenchcrown.com or call / WhatsApp us at 9723325522 and help us know your concern. We will
schedule a time with you and instruct our shipping partner to pick up the original French Crown
garment. Also note that we do not provide reverse pick-up service for order value less than Rs1000.
In such cases we request you to please self-ship the product to us. You can self-ship the product
using any courier service of your choice. Please share the courier receipt at
contact@frenchcrown.com with your order number. Make sure the garment is unused and in good state.
You are required to return the main product ONLY. REFUND Once we receive return shipment, 100%
refund will be initiated within 24 hours. 1) If you have done online payment, your refund will be
credited into your bank account within 5 to 7 days. 2) If you have done cash on delivery, you need
to provide us your bank account no., bank name and IFSC code. We will refund your amount via NEFT or
IMPS within 2 to 5 days. 3) You can also ask for refund in term of ‘French Crown Cashback’, which
you can use in future to buy other French Crown products. 4) Refund is possible only after parcel is
dispatched, delivered and reverse pick is done. EXCHANGE Once return shipment is picked up from your
premises, we will dispatch your exchange shipment from our warehouse. Exchange your standard size
garment with custom size garment: If our standard sizes don’t fit you and you want custom fit
garment in exchange, then put your best fit garment with your French Crown garment in your return
shipment and our courier boy will pick it up from your premises. We will construct your garment from
the scratch according to your measurement and deliver it to you within 10 to 15 days. We will save
your measurements for your future orders also. In one order Refund/Exchange is possible for one time
Only. FOR CUSTOM GARMENTS We want to provide every customer a wonderful experience. However, it is
not very sustainable for us to offer returns and exchanges for a custom garment as it is already
manufactured according to your specifications and can’t be sold to anyone else. We will gladly
replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you discover a manufacturing defect with a
product you bought from our store, please send us an email at contact@frenchcrown.com from the email
you placed the order with. We also provide a free alteration within 15 days, starting from the day
you received your order.
